screen_desc: The screenshot shows the Google mobile search interface. The search bar at the top displays the query "news this" with options to switch between "All," "News," "Videos," and "Images." Below the search bar, there's a news article from Hindustan Times titled "Evening brief: Centre rejects..." along with an image of a man speaking. At the bottom, there are navigation options for "Discover," "Search," and "Collections."
history_actions: click on the Google app icon located at the left and lower part of the screen.
type in the content: " news this evening"
click on the search suggestion "news this evening today" located at the bottom
click on the "News" tab located at the upper left part of the screen.
action_plan: Scroll down to check for more news articles related to this evening.
If more information is needed, refine the search to 'news this evening' or similar.

action_with_memory.Next Single Step Action: Scroll down to check for more news articles related to this evening.
